languages.text: "Закрой глаза. Доверься мне. Отринь страх и помни — ты носишь в себе смерть с рождения. Считай этот ритуал встречей со старым другом".
"Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."
languages.original_text: "Закрой глаза. Доверься мне. Отринь страх и помни — ты носишь в себе смерть с рождения. Считай этот ритуал встречей со старым другом".

traits.locale_text: "Close your eyes. Trust me. Reject your fear and remember: you carry death within you from birth. Consider this ritual a meeting with an old friend."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Close your eyes. Trust me. Reject your fear and remember: you carry death within you from birth. Consider this ritual a meeting with an old friend."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."

traits.locale_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Fermez les yeux et faites-moi confiance. Rejetez la peur et rappelez-vous que la mort est votre compagne de chaque instant depuis votre naissance. Ce rituel vous permet simplement de rencontrer votre plus vieille amie. »
languages.original_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."

traits.locale_text: « Fermez les yeux et faites-moi confiance. Rejetez la peur et rappelez-vous que la mort est votre compagne de chaque instant depuis votre naissance. Ce rituel vous permet simplement de rencontrer votre plus vieille amie. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Cierre los ojos y confíe en mí. Rechace su miedo y recuerde: la muerte l{mf|e|a} ha acompañado desde el nacimiento. Este ritual no es más que una reunión entre usted y su amigo más antiguo».
languages.original_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."

traits.locale_text: «Cierre los ojos y confíe en mí. Rechace su miedo y recuerde: la muerte l{mf|e|a} ha acompañado desde el nacimiento. Este ritual no es más que una reunión entre usted y su amigo más antiguo».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “闭上双眼，相信我。摒除你的恐惧，记住——自你诞生的那一刻起，死亡就早已如影随形，这个仪式不过是让你与你的老友重见一面罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."

traits.locale_text: “闭上双眼，相信我。摒除你的恐惧，记住——自你诞生的那一刻起，死亡就早已如影随形，这个仪式不过是让你与你的老友重见一面罢了。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「目を閉じて私を信頼してください。恐怖を捨て、思い出して…死は生まれた時からあなたの中にあります。この儀式は、あなたの古い友人に会うだけのことです」
languages.original_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."

traits.locale_text: 「目を閉じて私を信頼してください。恐怖を捨て、思い出して…死は生まれた時からあなたの中にあります。この儀式は、あなたの古い友人に会うだけのことです」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Schließt Eure Augen und vertraut mir. Lehnt Eure Angst ab und erinnert Euch — Ihr tragt den Tod seit Eurer Geburt in Euch. Dieses Ritual ist lediglich eine Begegnung zwischen Euch und Eurem ältesten Freund."
languages.original_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."

traits.locale_text: "Schließt Eure Augen und vertraut mir. Lehnt Eure Angst ab und erinnert Euch — Ihr tragt den Tod seit Eurer Geburt in Euch. Dieses Ritual ist lediglich eine Begegnung zwischen Euch und Eurem ältesten Freund."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Gözlerini kapat ve bana güven. Korkunu reddet ve unutma: Doğumundan beri ölümü içinde taşıyorsun. Bu ayin, yalnızca en eski dostunla bir karşılaşmadır."
languages.original_text: "Close your eyes and trust me. Reject your fear and remember — you have carried death within you since birth. This ritual is simply a meeting between you and your oldest friend."
